segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on that plate, it's like she's in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in a puddle of water, and she doesn't even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is really going for it, trying to get as many cookies as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, I can't believe he's not falling off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her turn, it's actually quite sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really turn around and see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, and she's completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the garden outside, it looks so calm and tidy, unlike the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt with all this water and the unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is like a comedy of errors waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
